changeSet.author: sha
changeSet.sql: create table name_index ( id bigint not null, name varchar(4000), type varchar(1), encode_type varchar(1), json_name varchar(4000), algo bigint not null, primary key (id) );

changeSet.author: sha
changeSet.sql: create table s_algo ( id bigint not null, name varchar(4000), primary key (id) )
